fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Afore Consulting follows all legislative and non-legislative files impacting the financial services sector; most notably in banking, securities, insurance, asset management, pensions and payments. The team also covers Energy Union, the Digital Single Market, the Brexit negotiations and the trade agenda.

membership: American Chamber of Commerce to the EU; Centre for European Policy Studies; American European Community Association (AECA); British Chamber of Commerce to the EU; Institute for International Finance (IIF)
relevant_communication:
Afore Consulting runs the Secretariat of EPIF - the European Payment Institutions Federation. 
 
Afore Consulting also runs the Secretariat of the EU Asia Financial Services Roundtable. 
 
Afore Consulting is the organiser of the annual Conference on FinTech, Digital Innovation and Regulation (https://www.fintech2018.eu/). 
 
We are also a co-organiser of the annual EU-Asia Financial Services Dialogue and Dinner on the fringes of the EU-Asia-Pacific Forum on Financial Regulation.
customers: Deutsche Bank# Morgan Stanley# MetLife# Zurich Insurance Company# Charles Schwab# GE Capital# Nomura International# VocaLink# Worldpay# Information Technology Group# Stripe# Oxera# Western Union# European Payment Institutions Federation# Argus Media# IHS Markit# Trafigura# Moody's Investor Services# British Insurance Brokers' Association# Letter One# PayPal
goals__remit: Afore Consulting is a European Public Affairs company, based in Brussels with a core strength in financial services, FinTech and competition policy. Afore Consulting also advises companies and organizations on corporate governance practices, company law, relations with non-EU countries (especially US and Asia), consumer protection, data privacy, information technology, energy policy and trade. Additional services provided by Afore Consulting include assisting clients in their regulatory strategies (including initial and ongoing authorisation) and commercial transactions, as well as offering specialised training courses.
